introduce.title: How Flux AI Image Generator Works
introduce.label: AI-Powered Creation
introduce.description: Flux AI Image Generator uses cutting-edge artificial intelligence to understand your text descriptions and convert them into high-quality, unique images. No design skills required - just describe what you want to see.

items.title: Natural Language Processing
items.description: Advanced AI understands complex descriptions, styles, emotions, and artistic concepts to create exactly what you envision.

items.title: Multiple AI Models
items.description: Choose from Flux Pro, Flux Dev, and Flux Schnell models optimized for different quality and speed requirements.

items.title: Style Customization
items.description: Transform your ideas with artistic styles, color palettes, lighting effects, and composition preferences.

items.title: High-Resolution Output
items.description: Generate images up to 4K resolution, perfect for print, web, social media, and professional presentations.

benefits.title: Why Creators Choose Flux AI Image Generator
benefits.label: Unmatched Advantages
benefits.description: Experience the future of creative content generation with AI technology that delivers professional results in seconds, not hours.

items.title: Instant Creative Output
items.description: Transform ideas into visuals instantly. What used to take hours of design work now takes seconds with Flux AI.

items.title: Professional Quality Results
items.description: Generate images that rival professional photographers and digital artists, with exceptional detail and artistic quality.

items.title: Limitless Creative Possibilities
items.description: From photorealistic portraits to abstract art, fantasy worlds to product visualizations - create anything imaginable.

usage.title: Generate Your First AI Image in 3 Simple Steps
usage.description: Getting started with Flux AI Image Generator is incredibly easy. Follow these steps to create your first AI-generated masterpiece.

items.title: Write Your Prompt
items.description: Describe your image in detail. Include subject, style, mood, colors, and any specific elements you want to include. The more specific, the better the results!

items.title: Choose AI Model & Style
items.description: Select from our AI models (Flux Pro for highest quality, Flux Schnell for fastest generation) and pick your preferred artistic style.

items.title: Generate & Download
items.description: Click generate and watch as Flux AI creates your image in seconds. Download your high-resolution masterpiece and share it with the world!

features.title: Advanced Features of Flux AI Image Generator
features.description: Discover the powerful capabilities that make Flux AI the leading choice for AI image generation.

items.title: Text-to-Image Generation
items.description: Convert any text description into stunning visuals with our advanced AI understanding.

items.title: Negative Prompt Support
items.description: Exclude unwanted elements from your images by specifying what you don't want to see.

items.title: Aspect Ratio Control
items.description: Generate images in perfect proportions for social media, print, or any specific use case.

items.title: Batch Image Generation
items.description: Create multiple variations of your prompt simultaneously to explore different creative directions.

items.title: Commercial License
items.description: Use generated images for commercial purposes with confidence - no hidden restrictions.

items.title: API Access
items.description: Integrate Flux AI into your applications with our comprehensive REST API and developer tools.

stats.title: Join Millions of Creators Using AI Image Generation
stats.description: Flux AI Image Generator is trusted by creators worldwide for professional-quality results.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Flux AI Image Generator
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about our AI-powered image generation platform.

items.question: How does Flux AI Image Generator work?
items.answer: Flux AI uses advanced machine learning models trained on millions of images to understand text descriptions and generate corresponding visuals. Simply enter a detailed prompt, and our AI creates a unique image in seconds.

items.question: What makes Flux AI different from other image generators?
items.answer: Flux AI offers superior image quality, faster generation speeds, more artistic style options, and better understanding of complex prompts. Our models are specifically trained for creative and professional use cases.

items.question: Can I use generated images for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Yes! All images generated with Flux AI come with commercial usage rights. You can use them in marketing materials, products, websites, social media, and any other commercial applications without restrictions.

items.question: How long does it take to generate an image?
items.answer: Generation times vary by model: Flux Schnell creates images in 5-10 seconds, Flux Dev in 10-20 seconds, and Flux Pro (highest quality) in 20-30 seconds. Premium plans offer priority processing for even faster results.

items.question: What types of images can I create?
items.answer: You can generate virtually any type of image: realistic photos, artistic illustrations, abstract art, fantasy scenes, product visualizations, character designs, landscapes, architecture, and much more. The only limit is your imagination!

items.question: Do I need design skills to use Flux AI?
items.answer: Not at all! Flux AI is designed for everyone, from complete beginners to professional artists. The better your text description, the better the results, but you don't need any technical art or design knowledge.

items.question: Is there an API available for developers?
items.answer: Yes! We offer a comprehensive REST API that allows developers to integrate Flux AI image generation into their applications, websites, and workflows. Check our developer documentation for details.
